items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and better quality than expected.
items.body: Fits perfectly and looks cute, great for Halloween but comfortable to just wear around the house too. Read more
items.author: Wbdgr

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Halloween cardigan
items.body: I love this! It's nice, soft and light and will be perfect for those days when there's enough chill in the air to wear it. I fit me great and looked nice on me. I love the pattern too. I will probably be buying the others as well. Read more
items.author: Tracy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant, comfy, beautiful!
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater! It is so soft and fits perfectly. I love how the sleeves aren't too tight on the arms or wrists. It is loose-fitting but not huge; so comfy! And the quality is excellent. The colors are so vibrant! Read more
items.author: Jodi Townsend

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product for the price, but not cotton as the description says
items.body: Fabric quality: Fabric quality is decent but not as advertised in the description. It is actually 95% poly 5% spandex. That is why I would not give it five stars if you’re going to advertise a product having cotton then it should have cotton otherwise it’s considered false advertisement. Size: Sizing does match the measurements in the description. Color: The color is good. Does look like van Gogh’s Starry Night and as an art teacher, it will be great for me. Wrinkle resistance: Not sure about wrinkle resistance, but I have missed it with water to let the wrinkles from packing work themselves out. Lightweight: It is lightweight, which is what I was looking for. Read more
items.author: Linda M. Robinson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Statement piece
items.body: I love this jacket and get a lot of compliments when I wear it. It's fun and trendy. Read more
items.author: chappytrails

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a true extra small … perfect
items.body: Lightweight, thin but comfy and best of all the extra small actually fit me!!! 5’3 105 lbs. no baggy shoulders, sleeves , too long length. Read more
items.author: LC

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Jacket
items.body: loved this jacket. The only issue is no pockets. Thats why 3 star rating. It also runs big so could have went with a medium instead of large. Washes beautiful and i get many compliments when i wear it. Read more
items.author: Dor Les

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and soft!
items.body: Halloween motif is great. Love it. Got many compliments. Lightweight cover up but warm enough if it's chilly. Perfect for South Florida. Many patterns to choose from is a bonus. Read more
items.author: Marly L Constantino

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue1, Halloween1, Halloween2, Halloween3. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
